overview: Luc Bondy's 1996 production of Don Carlos was staged, recorded and filmed at the Chatelet in Paris. These seven performances were blessed with an all-star cast, loaded with important singers either starting their careers (Roberto Alagna) or at the height of their dramatic powers (Karita Mattila, Jose Van Dam.)
tagline: A Starry 'Don Carlos' Brings Verdi, in French, to Paris
title: Verdi: Don Carlos
